mapper.insert: insert into gallery ( title, content, writer ) values ( #{title}, #{content}, (select id from users where username=#{username}) )

insert into gallery_image ( gallery_id, image_name ) values
(#{galleryId}, #{i})
mapper.select: select max(id) from gallery where writer=(select id from users where username=#{username})

select gal.title as "TITLE", gal.content as "CONTENT", gal.writer as "WRITER", gal.created_at as "CREATED_AT", gal.view_count as "VIEW_COUNT", gal_img.gallery_id as "GALLERY_ID", gal_img.image_name as "IMAGE_NAME" from gallery gal left join gallery_image gal_img on gal.id = gal_img.gallery_id order by gal.id asc, gal_img.gallery_id asc
